ValidationRule.description: In order for CPR to save with resolution of "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll" or "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll" they must enter a date in "Received Letter to Stop Termination"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK( Received_Letter_to_Stop_Termination__c ) && ( ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Keeping Payroll")|| ISPICKVAL( NPR_CPR_Resolution__c , "Client Saved - Set Up Non Payroll") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before you can mark the NPR CPR Resolution as "Saved" you must enter a date in the Received Letter to Stop Termination Field
